name: Destructive Restoration
description:
Game controls:

Keyboard- WASD to move, space/mouse 0 to place mine, E to interact

Controller(XBOX1): Thumbstick to move, A to place bombs and X to interact.

[PLEASE READ!]

The game should be built for Windows, Mac, and Linux, but if it works only on windows sorry, because in that case, I most likely ran out of time, and couldn't build it.

Please note that the game is pretty short, due to some mishaps on the way. If you want some more gamedev information visit my twitter: 

https://twitter.com/Pepper_Box_

Thank you for reading, have fun!
